No need for negativity.  If you are a parent, you know how hard it is, in 
this fast paced life, to write down beautiful memories of your children. 
 Whether the story is true or not, if is advertising a different way to use 
a FREE service for a great purpose.  I created my children's accounts.  I 
am adult, and I will run it until they are of age and even longer.  I will 
present it to them at their high school or college graduation.﻿

Я полагаю, ребенку все это было бы интересно читать только в одном случае: 
если папа бы писал в этих письмах о том, чего не говорил бы лично 
(например, какие-либо свои переживания). В ином случае, все бы это ребенок 
множество раз слышал и видел еще до получения своего аккаунта почты.

comments.text:
I'm a father and this ad got me so choked up. But it ended up not working 
as an ad because it is so manipulative and about being a parent and the joy 
that kids bring I think this kind of subject matter does not belong in ads 
and is wrong to use in the service of selling a product. I am probably 
bring too negative and hopefully Google really does care about and create 
software for families but the cynical side of me thinks they could care 
less about you and your kids, they just care about their quarterly 
earnings.﻿
